Definition.WordDefinition:
loony \loon"y\ (l[=oo]n"[y^]), a. [Shortened fr. lunatic.] 1. Crazy; insane; lunatic; mentally unsound. [Low, U.S.] [Written also {loony}, {luny} and {looney}.] See {Luny}. [1913 Webster]
2. Very foolish; very impractical; as, loony ideas. [PJC]
